name: bitbank-mcp
description: bitbank data tools and SVG chart renderer. ALWAYS use render_chart_svg for charts; do not self-render.

get_volatility_metrics.description: Compute volatility metrics (RV/ATR/Parkinson/GK/RS) with rolling trends and tags. view=summary for quick scan, detailed for analysis, full for complete data.

get_ticker.description: Get ticker for a pair (e.g., btc_jpy)

get_orderbook.description: Get orderbook topN for a pair

get_candles.description: Get candles. date: '1month' → YYYY, others → YYYYMMDD. view=full (default) includes first 5 items sample in text (full array in structuredContent.data.normalized). Date is inclusive: fetch {limit} most recent candles up to and including the specified date. Example item: { isoTime, open, high, low, close, volume }. Error handling: Returns errorType='user' for invalid pair/type/date/limit, errorType='network' for network errors.

render_chart_svg.description: Render candlestick chart as SVG. Do NOT self-render; display returned SVG only.

detect_patterns.description: Detect classic chart patterns from recent candles.

get_flow_metrics.description: Compute flow metrics (CVD, aggressor ratio, volume spikes) from recent transactions. Returns aggregated buy/sell flow with spike detection. content shows summary; detailed data in structuredContent.data. Use for short-term flow dominance, event detection, momentum shifts. Prefer analyze_market_signal for integrated daily signals. bucketMs default 60000 (recommend 15000-60000 spikes, 60000-300000 trends). view=summary|buckets|full (full prints all buckets and may be long). bucketsN: Number of recent buckets to print in content (default 10). Outputs zscore and spike flags per bucket. tz sets display timezone (default Asia/Tokyo).

get_depth.description: Get raw orderbook depth. view=summary|sample|full. sample/full prints top levels in content (LLM-friendly); full may be long. sampleN controls count (default 10). sample also shows topN totals and bestBid/bestAsk spread. Use this for raw, fast data; use get_orderbook for stats/ratios.

get_circuit_break_info.description: Circuit break / auction info is currently unsupported (no public source). Do not call. Returns ok=false with reason=unsupported.
